oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Aldred, Alfred, 1908 April 20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Alfred Aldred, dated April 20th, 1908. Illustrates the first page of the document. A notation on the verso says “”4-20-08, unprobated.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Aldred family
